Trade/Device Name(s): EasyPlus mini R2N Self-Monitoring Blood Glucose Test System
EasyPlus mini R2N Blood Glucose Test Strips
EasyPlus mini R2N Glucose Normal/High Control Solution
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): EasyPlus mini R2N Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for EasyPlus mini R2N Self-Monitoring Blood Glucose Test System for quantitative glucose measurement using electrochemical biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips or forearm, for home use by persons with diabetes or in clinical settings by healthcare professionals, to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control
